heading: HR00187
0: A RESOLUTION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES EXPRESSING RAGE AND CONDEMNATION ON THE SERIES OF KILLINGS IN NEGROS ISLAND WHERE AN INCREASE ON THE NUMBER OF DEATHS WAS SEEN SINCE THE IMPLEMENTATION OF MEMORANDUM ORDER NO. 32 AND CALLING ALL LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES TO IMMEDIATELY PUT AN END TO THE KILLINGS
